response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to us at $1,000,000, but I understand its importance to you and am willing to negotiate.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for a special price of $950,000. This is a fantastic deal considering its worth and the benefits it offers. I believe this price reflects the value we place on your interest and commitment to our product.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
